row.name: JOBI.OEBS.MONTH_END
row.description: Includes to Check if Month-End is Enabled

row.process: :IF &SKIP_ON_MONTH_END# = "Y" : SET &MONTH_END_MODE# = GET_VAR(VARA.STATIC.OEBS.ENABLE_MONTH_END,ENABLE_MONTH_END) : IF &MONTH_END_MODE# = "Y" : PRINT Skipping due to Month End Processing.. : STOP NOMSG : ENDIF :ENDIF
